SourceAnalyzer.Name: Rus Wizards C# Rules
SourceAnalyzer.Description: These custom rules provide extensions to the ones provided with StyleCop by Rus Wizards company.

Rule.Name: InstanceVariablesUnderscorePrefix
Rule.Context: Instance variables should be prefixed by underscore and folloed by lower case: {0}.
Rule.Description: Instance variables are easier to distinguish when prefixed with an underscore.

Rule.Name: UseClassNameOrThis
Rule.Context: Instance variables should be started by class name or "this": {0}.
Rule.Description: For better intellesecne instance variables shuld be started by class name or "this".

Rule.Name: DoNotUseLinqAliases
Rule.Description: Linq aliases cann't resolve all necessitis and make worse a code-view.

Rule.Name: MinimumFieldLength
Rule.Context: Minimum fiels length should be 2 symbols: {0}.
Rule.Description: Not allowed very short names for fields.

Rule.Name: DoNotUseBuiltInTypeAliases
Rule.Context: Use {0} or {1} rather than the built-in type alias '{2}'.
Rule.Description: Enforces the don't use of the built-in types.
